John Varvatos is an American international luxury men’s lifestyle brand founded by John Varvatos, which designs, manufactures, and retails high-end fashion. Varvatos has been recognized as "Menswear Designer of the Year" three times by the CFDA and named GQ’s "Designer of the Year" in 2007.
